title: stefanionut99
author: stefanionut99
content: GREEN MINING(CLOUD MINING) - BITCOIN GREEN(BGN)THE GLOBAL BITCOIN MINING WITH GREEN ENERGYWhat is Bitcoin Green?Bitcoin green is a coin built for the green energy bitcoin mining industry.GreenMing PlatfromGreenMining opens access to eco-mining for everyone.The specificity of the GreenMining is the use of only renewable energy sources Solar, Volcano, hydro, wind. The GreenMining manages to generate electricity and provide eco-mining machines in an affordable and sustainable way.Coin Name: Bitcoin GreenTicker: BGNCirculating supply: 8,000,000 BGNMaximum supply: 21,000,000 BGNHashcash: Proof of Stake(POS)Average transactions per block: 2.16 TPBAverage transaction fee: 0.0001 BGNPOS block reward: 1 BNGBlock time: 1 minuteLinksOfficial Website: https://www.btcgreen.orgTwitter: https://twitter.com/bitcoingreenBGNTelegram Channel: https://t.me/bgn_newsTelegram Chat: https://t.me/bitcoingreenchatWhitepaper: https://whitepaper.btcgreen.orgGithub repositories: https://github.com/BitcoinGreenLabs/CoreExplorer: https://scan.btcgreen.orgMail:go@btcgreen.orghello@btcgreen.org
